meanings.sent1: She always remembers the deets of every story she hears.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to include all the deets in your report.
meanings.sent3: The detective carefully examined the deets to solve the case.
meanings.sent4: The deets of the plan were carefully laid out for everyone to understand.
meanings.sent5: Her memory was so sharp, she could recall the deets of any conversation.

meanings.definition: Deet: a type of insect repellent
meanings.sent1: Before going camping, don't forget to pack the deets.
meanings.sent2: The deet kept the mosquitoes away during the hike.
meanings.sent3: She sprayed the deet on her arms and legs to avoid bug bites.
meanings.sent4: The deet was like a shield against the pesky insects.
meanings.sent5: The deet had a strong smell but was effective in repelling bugs.

meanings.definition: Deet: to provide information or details
meanings.sent1: Can you deet us about the upcoming event?
meanings.sent2: She always deets us on the latest gossip in town.
meanings.sent3: He deeted the group with all the funny anecdotes from the party.
meanings.sent4: The witness deeted the police about what he saw that night.
meanings.sent5: She loves to deet everyone about her exciting adventures.
